1.title: Who am I?
1.content: My name is Yanis, I'm 20 years old, and I am currently working as an apprentice in web development. I am in my third year of the Computer Science Bachelor's program in Lannion. Passionate about technology, I enjoy creating solutions that meet users' needs while striving to make their experience smooth and enjoyable.

2.title: My Journey
2.content: Throughout my studies and professional experience, I have gained strong skills in development, project management, and performance optimization. I enjoy taking on challenges and working on diverse projects that allow me to constantly learn and improve.

3.title: My Vision
3.content: Curious and passionate, I always stay updated with new trends in my field. My goal is to continue perfecting my skills in web development and create innovative solutions to enhance the user experience.
